mapper.select: SELECT appl_title, appl_author, appl_publisher, Date_format(reg_date, '%Y .%m .%d.') as reg_date, appl_state, appl_no FROM BOOK_APPL WHERE 1=1 AND mem_no = #{mem_no} AND use_flag = 'Y'
mapper.update: update BOOK_APPL set use_flag = 'N', mod_date = now() WHERE 1=1 and mem_no = #{mem_no} and appl_no = #{appl_no} and appl_state != '입고완료' and appl_state != '입고중'
